project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would provide for: (a) selection and training of a national team of 40 educators to provide professional leadership for the project; (b) revision of the teacher training programs and development and distribution of instructional materials; (c) construction and equipping specialized facilities at 15 secondary teacher training colleges and 54 primary teacher training institutes and equipping only of 14 additional primary teacher training institutes; (d) retraining of about 7,000 teacher educators in new curricula and teaching methods; and (e) project monitoring and evaluation, studies on problems affecting teacher utilization in schools and preparatory studies for future education projects.
